entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 04:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -36

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
